TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit VisualStyleElement/StartPanel/UserPane extends System.Object
public: ref class VisualStyleElement::StartPanel::UserPane abstract sealed

Docs.summary: Provides a for the top border of the **Start** menu. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.StartPanel.UserPane.Normal%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.StartPanel.UserPane>類別會傳回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement>表示上框線的**啟動**功能表。
## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>與<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement>傳回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.StartPanel.UserPane.Normal%2A>屬性。 若要執行這個範例，請將其貼入 Windows Form 中。 處理表單的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件和呼叫`DrawVisualStyleElementStartPanelUserPane1`方法從<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件處理方法，傳遞`e`為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>。
[!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#214](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples/CS/Form1.cs#214)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#214](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples/VB/Form1.vb#214)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Normal As VisualStyleElement

Docs.summary: Gets a visual style element that represents the top border of the **Start** menu.
Docs.value: A表示上框線的 * * 開始 * * 功能表。

remarks.format:
## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>與<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement>傳回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.StartPanel.UserPane.Normal%2A>屬性。 若要執行這個範例，請將其貼入 Windows Form 中。 處理表單的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件和呼叫`DrawVisualStyleElementStartPanelUserPane1`方法從<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件處理方法，傳遞`e`為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>。
[!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#214](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples/CS/Form1.cs#214)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#214](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples/VB/Form1.vb#214)]
